mapper.select: SELECT 蔵書.蔵書コード as "holdingCode.value", 本.本ID as "book.bookId.value", 本.タイトル as "book.title.value", 本.著者 as "book.author.value", 本.本種別 as "book.bookType" FROM 蔵書 INNER JOIN 本 on (蔵書.本ID = 本.本ID) WHERE 蔵書.蔵書コード = #{holdingCode.value}

SELECT 蔵書.蔵書コード as "holdingCode.value", 本.本ID as "book.bookId.value", 本.タイトル as "book.title.value", 本.著者 as "book.author.value", 本.本種別 as "book.bookType" FROM 蔵書 INNER JOIN 本 on (蔵書.本ID = 本.本ID) WHERE 蔵書.蔵書コード IN
#{holdingCode.value}

#{bookId.value}

SELECT 蔵書.蔵書コード as "holdingCode.value", 本.本ID as "book.bookId.value", 本.タイトル as "book.title.value", 本.著者 as "book.author.value", 本.本種別 as "book.bookType" FROM 蔵書 INNER JOIN 本 on (蔵書.本ID = 本.本ID) LEFT OUTER JOIN 貸出 on 蔵書.蔵書コード = 貸出.蔵書コード LEFT OUTER JOIN 返却 on 貸出.貸出ID = 返却.貸出ID WHERE NOT (貸出.貸出ID IS NOT NULL AND 返却.貸出ID IS NULL)
SELECT 蔵書.蔵書コード as "value" FROM 蔵書 WHERE 蔵書.蔵書コード = #{holdingCode.value} FOR UPDATE NOWAIT
